sections.title: What is Trading212 and how the bonus works
content: Trading 212 is an intuitive investment platform that allows you to trade stocks, ETFs, currencies, and commodities with zero commissions.
The 'Refer a Friend' promotion allows you to receive a free share of ‚Ç¨25 simply by opening an Invest account and depositing a small amount.
In addition to the welcome bonus, you can invite your friends to get up to 5 free shares for each promotional period.

sections.title: Key requirements
content: Must be of legal age and not already have a Trading212 account.
Accepted documents: National ID card (electronic or paper) or Passport. Note: Driving license is NOT accepted.
Deposit at least ‚Ç¨15 into the 'Invest' account and make 3 transactions of at least ‚Ç¨5 each using the free virtual card (top-ups to Revolut via payment links are also valid).

sections.title: Step-by-step guide
content: 1. Register via the invite link and choose the 'Invest' profile (avoid the CFD profile for the bonus).
2. Complete identity verification: the process is automatic and usually takes a few minutes.
3. Deposit at least ‚Ç¨15 via bank transfer, card, or Google Pay (free up to ‚Ç¨2000).
4. Activate your free virtual card in the app and use it to make 3 payments of at least ‚Ç¨5 (e.g., Revolut top-ups via payment link or small online purchases).
5. You will receive your free share within minutes after transaction verification.
6. The bonus is normally withdrawable after 30 days.
1. Convert the bonus balance from EUR to USD in the 'Manage Funds' menu.
2. Buy a US stock (e.g., Tesla or Amazon) using the converted dollars.
3. After 15 minutes, sell the stock choosing to receive the proceeds directly in Euro.
4. Withdraw the balance immediately by topping up your Revolut account with the Trading212 virtual card.
